page.title: 04Pentre Mill Farm study
page.content: The farmer owns 110 acres of land. He has different types of cattle in each field. He has ten small buildings around the{dairy farm}some of them being used for chickens and hens.The cows get milked in a building called a milking parlour. They do not grow crops on the farm but just have grazing land for the cattle and sheep. They have{nurseries} not far from the farm where they grow plants and flowers. The farmer sells his produce and animals at the{markets in Abergele and St. Asaph.
